All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.accessibility.Accessible, java.awt.datatransfer.ClipboardOwner, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.awt.print.Printable, java.io.Serializable
public class BeartexPFPlot
extends java.awt.Frame
implements java.awt.datatransfer.ClipboardOwner, java.awt.print.Printable

The BeartexPFPlot is a class to plot pole figures from Beartex.

Since:
JDK1.1
